name: MAKE BELIEVE
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I've been countin' the days
Since you went away
Like clockwork in a cathedral
Your messages are toxic in nature
Less partner, more neighbor
Your cold shoulder cuts
[Chorus]
I think that you would know that
You're not a dummy
It's so fucking funny
To you
You generate your ecstasy
Like it's only a dream
You don't care to love for me
At all
Just so tired of it all
You missed another call
Why even write this ensemble?
[Post-Chorus]
Weaving lies throughout the tale
All these cries you fake and wail
Why'd you think this was the right call?
[Verse 2]
Why the need to be so cynical all the time?
Invisibility makes it nigh to catch the light
Sing a lullaby and put your mind at ease
Consider taking a leap of faith for me
Please
[Bridge]
But you could never do that
You're just a dummy
You're so fucking funny
Loser
I wish that you could understand that
You're only a dream
Project free of insecurity
[Chorus]
I think that you would know that
You're not a dummy
It's so fucking funny
To you
You generate your ecstasy
Like it's only a dream
You don't care to love for me
At all
Just so tired of it all
You missed another call
Why even write this ensemble?
[Outro]
Why generate your ecstasy?
'Cause it's only a dream
It's just a dream
